price: Biz, gökleri, yeri ve arasındakileri ancak hak ile yarattık. Kıyamet elbette gelecektir. Sen (Ey Muhammed!) güzel bir şekilde affederek muamele et.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَأٓتِيَةٞۖ فَٱصۡفَحِ ٱلصَّفۡحَ ٱلۡجَمِيلَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqnā al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā illā bil-ḥaqi wa-inna al-sāʿata laātiyatun fa-iṣ'faḥi al-ṣafḥa al-jamīla
